item.title: Vue.js: Add component on click
item.description: I have been working on a project which uses Vue.js for front end. I came across a scenario where we need to allow user to add more entry in their form. Initial Approach The first thought that come to my mind will be get the div#id of the element and append it dynamically through javascript
